mapper.select: select *, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng},#{lat}), POINT(lng, lat)) as distance from (select t.*, i.fileName from (select b.id, d.goods_id, b.b_name, b.addrbasic, d.prod1retail, d.cate, d.alltime, d.review_star, d.review_count, b.lat, b.lng from business_detail as d join business as b on d.id = b.id) as t join business_detail_image as i on i.goods_id = t.goods_id where i.filetype = "main_image") as l where ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng},#{lat}), POINT(lng, lat)) <=5000 order by distance;

select *, ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng},#{lat}), POINT(lng, lat)) as distance from (select t.*, i.fileName from (select b.id, d.goods_id, b.b_name, b.addrbasic, d.prod1retail, d.cate, d.alltime, d.review_star, d.review_count, b.lat, b.lng from business_detail as d join business as b on d.id = b.id where d.cate = #{cate}) as t join business_detail_image as i on i.goods_id = t.goods_id where i.filetype = "main_image") as l where ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng},#{lat}), POINT(lng, lat)) <=5000 order by distance ${limit};
